comment: Love laura she is the coolest. Not to mention she is beyond hottt! Hard to focus in class because of her good looks.
She flys through work and does not go back and explain very often and her homework is unclear and beyond long.  She is not someone i would take again.

At times, she fails to help students or she gets upset during lecture if someone doesn't understand. She is very unorganized, but a good thing is that she offers SEVERAL extra credit opportunities throughout the semester to improve your grade. StatsPortal is very faulty, but it's not going to be used next semester. She's not that bad.
Good professor, knows her stuff. Homework in this class is heavy, especially for summer semester and stats portal is very fault. overall though she made statistics as painless as possible

I am actually really surprised at the positive feedback she gets. She has no idea what she's talking about, and one homework assignment requires about 3-4 hours of your time. The website she uses is very faulty and contains numerous wrong answers. She gets answers wrong when working them in class. Very unprofessional. Don't recommend her at all.

I dreaded being in stats, hate math and always will. Somehow managed to pull a good grade in her class. As long as you make an effort,do all your assigments,labs,and project you will be fine. Responds to email in timely manner. Funny,glad I took her for this class. Glad its over but I highly recommend her if you have math anxiety like me.

She is very approachable.  Extremely willing to help a student.  Exams and quizzes are take home and online.  Will use Excel a lot.  I dreaded taking this class but she made it bearable.  Do the homework and ask questions.  You'll do great!

She is awesome!!! SO funny. Just do the homework and you will be fine. If you do the homework the tests will be easy. All the tests are online. Quizzes are in class. Dont do the test with anyone she will catch you. Shes awesome though if you need help just ask. She responds to emails quickly. LOVE HER
Her teacher style is fast so be careful

Amazing teacher and great class. She is so funny and laid back. You learn a lot, but you don't feel super stressed out. The class is very easy if you listen and do your homework. She teaches you how to master excel - a great skill to use in the work force! I highly recommend her. I wish I could take all of my math classes with Professor Tutterow!

Don't listen to the whiners, she is a great teacher and I learned a lot. She grades fair and her tests are take home. If you are not a math major and just want the ease of learning some things about Stats and moving on take her. Taking her class will be the least stressed you will have to be concerned with. Nice lady and cares about her students.

She is a nice professor but completely useless. She doesn't teach anything and she runs through the powerpoint slides so fast you can't write anything down.  You ask her to go back a slide and she says "You can find that in your book"...well if that's the case then why am I here? Don't expect to understand anything at the end of the semester.

She is lazy, and doesnt teach very well. Although if you just attempt the homework, you get credit. if you do the review you get 10 points on your test. She rushes through things, my class was almost a month behind at one point.
She is absolutely useless  and lazy when it comes to teaching BUT it makes it very easy to pass the class. She will let you make up anything you miss and will give extra credit.

This prof is great! I really enjoyed her class, and she made statistics much more tolerable. She is VERY forgiving with homework and tests. She is passionate about teaching, and it deffinately shows. She is a role model in my oppinion and I would suggest her class to anyone!

Prof Tutterow is awesome. A bit confusing at times, but tries to explain things so everyone can understand. VERY forgiving on homework and tests. Honestly, still scratching my head how anyone got less than a B. Just "TRY" the homework and you get credit!
Prof laura is excellent and very helpful.She has a unique way to support and help students.She is the best prof. for any student taking maths.Thanks Prof. laura for your help.

While she doesn't directly take attendance, you have homework due every day and if you miss a day you will miss a homework grade. She has take home tests, but they are on Excel. There is a lot of material you have to learn. You also learn a lot about Excel. Her lectures are really dry, and it is hard to pay attention. Don't miss a day  of class!!!

She was a nice lady, but a not so good teacher. I didn't really learn anything. Make sure you go to class and do the homework. She checks the homework every class period and it will really hurt you in the end if you miss some. Everything is done on excel so you get to know how to use the program really well. I wouldn't recommend her.

Very nice. Short powerpoint then goes over examples in the book. You have to teach yourself for the most part, but you have a week to do a take home test. I really liked her, and if you have an A at the end of the year, you can exempt the final exam. Take her if you're good with Microsoft Excel too!

She is AWESOME!!! She is really funny and totally sacrastic, she goes over all of the homework which really helps explain everything. Do the homework and you'll get an A. The tests are take home and you have a week to do them and the review is just like the test. Awesome teacher, highly recommend her.

Very nice instructor but her teaching style is horrible. Taught statistics via powerpoint. I was expecting a little more instruction than just sitting through a pp. Basically had to teach myself, but she is available if you have trouble. Nice lady, but if you need to know stats, don't take her.
